document_data.name: Guildsmeet
document_data.mainbody: '''Guildsmeet''' was a festival held in [[Waterdeep]] as part of the [[Waukeentide]] holiday.
document_data.Description: The festival started with the meeting of the various [[Guilds of Waterdeep]] in their respective halls for the announcement of new policies and a commemoration of their activities in the previous year. Following those meetings, the guilds sponsored a gala festival and dance that lasted from dusk to dawn. The dance was traditionally held in the [[Cynosure (building)|Cynosure]], the [[Field of Triumph]], and the [[Market (Waterdeep)|Market]], typically also dominating all the streets and locations in the area between them.
document_data.History: Originally a separate holiday, Guildsmeet was incorporated into Waukeentide and became one of the [[tenday]]-long holiday's many festivities.
